title: contact
description: A GUID representing entry in a contact's work history.

org.description: The org which this contact represents.

person.description: The ps:person GUID which owns this contact.

name.description: The person name listed for the contact.

title.description: The job/org title listed for this contact.

photo.description: The photo listed for this contact.

orgname.description: The listed org/company name for this contact.

orgfqdn.description: The listed org/company FQDN for this contact.

user.description: The username or handle for this contact.

web:acct.description: The social media account for this contact.

web:group.description: A web group representing this contact.

birth:place.description: A fully resolved place of birth for this contact.

birth:place:loc.description: The loc of the place of birth of this contact.

birth:place:name.description: The name of the place of birth of this contact.

death:place.description: A fully resolved place of death for this contact.

death:place:loc.description: The loc of the place of death of this contact.

death:place:name.description: The name of the place of death of this contact.

dob.description: The date of birth for this contact.

dod.description: The date of death for this contact.

url.description: The home or main site for this contact.

email.description: The main email address for this contact.

email:work.description: The work email address for this contact.

address.description: The street address listed for the contact.

place.description: The place associated with this contact.

phone.description: The main phone number for this contact.

phone:fax.description: The fax number for this contact.

phone:work.description: The work phone number for this contact.

id:number.description: An ID number issued by an org and associated with this contact.

adid.description: A Advertising ID associated with this contact.

imid.description: An IMID associated with the contact.

imid:imei.description: An IMEI associated with the contact.

imid:imsi.description: An IMSI associated with the contact.

names.description: The person name listed for the contact.

emails.description: An array of secondary/associated email addresses.

web:accts.description: An array of secondary/associated web accounts.

users.description: An array of secondary/associated user names.
